parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Number of items per page (or 'all' to fetch all items)

get.description: Filter projects using EAV attributes with various comparison operators such as eq, gt, lt, gte, lte, ne, like, in.

parameters.name: filters[name][like]
parameters.description: Filter projects by name using 'LIKE' operator. Example: filters[name][like]=HP

parameters.name: filters[status][eq]
parameters.description: Exact match for status. Example: filters[status][eq]=active

parameters.name: filters[id][gt]
parameters.description: Filter by ID greater than a value. Example: filters[id][gt]=10

parameters.name: filters[created_at][lte]
parameters.description: Filter by created_at date less than or equal to a specific date. Example: filters[created_at][lte]=2024-01-01

parameters.name: filters[category][in]
parameters.description: Filter by category in a list. Example: filters[category][in]=IT,Finance,Marketing

delete.summary: Delete a user from a project
delete.description: Remove a user from a specific project by providing the user and project IDs.

post.summary: Add a user to a project

user_id.description: ID of the user to be added to the project

project_id.description: ID of the project where the user will be added

created_by.description: ID of the user who created the project

status_for_bank.description: Status of the project for the bank

updated_by.description: ID of the user who updated the project

BearerToken.description: Enter 'Bearer' [space] and then your token. Example: 'Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...'
